title: Undekhi
overview: Show depicts the two aspects of the society - the power-drunk influential people who think they can get away with anything and the oppressed, subjected to years of torture, who finally decide to bring themselves to justice

tv.episodeOverview: An intruder breaks into the Atwal resort and attacks one of the Atwals. Abhaya finds out he has more in common with Koyal than he thought. Daman-Teji makes headway into their plan of becoming business partners with Samarth, while some friends turn into foes.
